effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the []{location:mining-museum} in []{location:oreburgh-city} or the Museum of Science in []{location:pewter-city} to receive a []{pokemon:omanyte}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into an Omanyte.

flavor_text_entries.text:
大昔　海に　すんでいた
古代ポケモンの　カセキ。
貝殻の　一部らしい。

A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that once lived in the sea. It might be
a piece of a seashell.

Fossile di un Pokémon preistorico che viveva in
mare. Sembra essere parte di una conchiglia.

Fósil de un Pokémon ancestral que vivió en el
fondo del mar. Parece ser un fragmento de
concha marina.

Das Fossil eines uralten Pokémon, das in der
Tiefsee lebte. Es ähnelt einer Muschelschale.

Le fossile d’un ancien Pokémon aquatique.
On dirait un morceau de coquillage.

오랜 옛날 바다에 살았던
고대 포켓몬의 화석.
조개껍질의 일부인 듯하다.

おおむかし　うみに　すんでいた
こだい　ポケモンの　カセキ。
かいがらの　いちぶ　らしい。

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

Fossile d’un ancien Pokémon aquatique.
On dirait un morceau de coquillage.

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a seashell.

A piece of an
ancient marine
POKéMON’s seashell.
